author: geirm
msg: Helps formalize the idea of using the context as a thread-safe storage unit for parsing and init-ing.  Moved the template-name stuff from Context, and added support for 'node-local context data introspection caching', to coin a phrase.

author: geirm
msg: Patch from Jose Alberto Fernandez <JFernandez@viquity.com> correcting one (stupid) bug and a nice trick for addNamespace()

author: jon
msg: added support for normalizing the path
